rooms.description: Widely spaced entrance hall with ample natural lighting and decorative art deco elements. Placed at the front to welcome guests.
Open-plan living room with art deco inspired furniture and accent lighting. Connects to the dining area.
Dining room adjacent to living space with an art deco styled chandelier and polished floors. Follows Vastu principles for auspicious dining.
Modern kitchen integrated with state-of-the-art appliances. Designed with Vastu principles for proper flow and functionality.
Guest bedroom on the ground floor for convenience with art deco accents and Vastu alignment.
Well-designed bathroom ensuring privacy. Incorporates art deco tiles and efficient space usage.

openings.description: Grand art deco styled front door. Ensures energy flow per Vastu guidelines.
Large side windows for natural lighting and ventilation, positioned to maximize sun exposure in the morning as per Vastu principles.

rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with an ensuite bathroom and art deco design elements. Vastu-compliant for prosperity.
Second bedroom designed for privacy and comfort, with art deco detailing.
Third bedroom offering serene space. Decorated with art deco accents in line with Vastu energy flow.
Additional bathroom to serve the upper bedrooms. Features art deco tiling and efficient fixtures.
Private study room incorporating art deco elements and designed for creativity. Vastu principles ensure a positive energy flow.

openings.description: Balcony doors leading to the rooftop terrace, designed with art deco motifs and Vastu guidelines for energy balance.

rooms.description: Expansive rooftop terrace with luxurious landscaping and seating areas. Includes a pergola for shade and art deco lighting features.

openings.description: Stepped entrance to the rooftop terrace from the first floor, designed to maintain a seamless flow and adhere to Vastu principles.
